summary: This is an internal FBI memorandum regarding overdue evidence items that need to be recharged or returned to the Evidence Control Unit. It references FEP policy 4.10 and indicates that case agents have been notified about exhibits that have not been properly managed.
keyFacts: The document references FBI Evidence Charge out Procedures under FEP policy 4.10.
Case agents have been notified about overdue evidence items that need to be recharged or returned to the Evidence Control Unit.
The Field Office Health Measures report is provided to the ADIC every 30 days by HQ, showing the percentage of items not recharged.
